# PLAYER::DISABLE_PLAYER_VEHICLE_REWARDS

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Disabled vehicle rewards when entering a vehicle (e.g. player is given a shotgun when entering a police vehicle).
